name: The Boar Princess (Active)
description:
Each time you unequip an Equipment Card from one of your characters: Gain 1 Omni Element.
Usage(s): 2
(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon or Artifact replaced.)
